channel.title: [Python] Irc Bot question
channel.description:
Ok, well I am creating a IRC Bot in Python, the whole base stuff is down and such, except when I go to do a ban, or a kick or any command that requires a name, it just does a name ban, I would like it to do a hostname ban, any idea's how ? If you want to look at the source code, PM Me :).
Also, I need to create a SIMPLE Google function, like it returns the first 2 results or something, any idea's ?
Thanks, Bob Lablah

item.title: [Python] Irc Bot question
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:10, topic:94698”][quote author=I chr1s I link=topic=137047.msg1324374#msg1324374 date=1179282322]

http://pygoogle.sourceforge.net/dist/

Well, there you go.

Your not helping him no need to post and i know im not helping him but im helping you
[/quote]
Quiet you.

As for the hostname ban, my bot sends a WHO string to the server, and the server returns the person’s WHO info in a single string. I then loop to grab that string (the loop is there in case a lot of talking is going on when I send the WHO request). Once I get the string, I split it to get their hostname. You’ll need to do something similar to that, using things specific to Python of course. When doing multiple things (eg: placing a ban, and then kicking someone) you’ll need to make sure that there is a period of time between them (In my bot I’ve got a 600ms wait before doing the next thing - it looks like this: Thread.sleep(600); )

Anyway, goog luck with it. :)[/quote]hehe, I showed you about needing a looop <3

Read full topic

item.title: [Python] Irc Bot question
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“I chr1s I, post:8, topic:94698”][quote author=thiefmn6092 link=topic=137047.msg1324317#msg1324317 date=1179281864]

http://pygoogle.sourceforge.net/dist/

Well, there you go.
[/quote]

Your not helping him no need to post and i know im not helping him but im helping you[/quote]
Quiet you.

As for the hostname ban, my bot sends a WHO string to the server, and the server returns the person’s WHO info in a single string. I then loop to grab that string (the loop is there in case a lot of talking is going on when I send the WHO request). Once I get the string, I split it to get their hostname. You’ll need to do something similar to that, using things specific to Python of course. When doing multiple things (eg: placing a ban, and then kicking someone) you’ll need to make sure that there is a period of time between them (In my bot I’ve got a 600ms wait before doing the next thing - it looks like this: Thread.sleep(600); )

Anyway, goog luck with it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Python] Irc Bot question
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

Get the text of google.com/search?poo&la or whatever the page is, then parse it to get the 1st/2nd/3rd/etc results.

Read full topic
